author: oheger
msg: DefaultExpressionEngine now supports a node name matcher.
By providing a custom matcher it is possible to influence the search operations

author: oheger
msg: Added a default matcher implementation for node names.
The new implementation performs an exact match on a node name. It is defined as
a constant in an enumeration class because a single instance can be shared

author: oheger
msg: Implemented the new methods of the NodeHandler interface.
